title: spack fetch hypre fails
body:
Summary
I can't use spack to simply download a package tarball

### Expected Result
A tarball downloaded to var/spack/cache

### Actual Result

No download occured and instead...

```
borax2{miller86}430: spack fetch hypre
==> Error: No compilers found for operating system rhel7 and target x86_64.
If previous installations have succeeded, the operating system may have been updated.
Compilers are defined for the following operating systems and targets:
	rhel6-x86_64
Run 'spack compiler find' to add compilers.
```

However, here is more info from spack...

```
borax2{miller86}431: spack compilers
==> Available compilers
-- gcc rhel6-x86_64 ---------------------------------------------
gcc@4.6.1  gcc@4.4.7  gcc@3.4.6

-- intel rhel6-x86_64 -------------------------------------------
intel@17.0.2  intel@16.0.2  intel@15.0.3  intel@14.0.3  intel@13.1.1  intel@12.1.5  intel@12.0.4  intel@9.1
intel@17.0.0  intel@16.0.1  intel@15.0.1  intel@14.0.2  intel@13.1.0  intel@12.1.3  intel@11.1
intel@16.0.4  intel@16.0.0  intel@15.0.0  intel@14.0.1  intel@13.0.1  intel@12.1.2  intel@10.1
intel@16.0.3  intel@15.0.4  intel@14.0.4  intel@14.0.0  intel@13.0.0  intel@12.1.0  intel@10.0

-- pgi rhel6-x86_64 ---------------------------------------------
pgi@17.1-0  pgi@16.5-0  pgi@15.10-0  pgi@15.1-0   pgi@14.3-0   pgi@13.2-0  pgi@12.1-0   pgi@10.9-0  pgi@8.0-1
pgi@16.9-0  pgi@16.3-0  pgi@15.7-0   pgi@14.10-0  pgi@13.10-0  pgi@13.1-1  pgi@11.10-0  pgi@10.2-0  pgi@7.1-3
pgi@16.7-0  pgi@16.1-0  pgi@15.5-0   pgi@14.7-0   pgi@13.6-0   pgi@12.8-0  pgi@11.1-0   pgi@9.0-4
borax2{miller86}432: cd ~/HDF5/spack/
/g/g11/miller86/HDF5/spack
borax2{miller86}433: git branch
* develop
```

The problem appears to be a difference in ``rhel6`` vs ``rhel7``
